title: Umbrella Academy Allison Vinyl Figure
body_html:
"I heard a rumorâ€¦" You know, we heard a rumor too, that Allison was making her Youtooz debut! Stood at 5 inches tall with a raised finger held up to her smirking lips as her hand rests on her hip, her long curly balayage hair is pulled to the back and falls down past her waist as its fringe parts frame her face perfectly. Always dressed damn stylishly, she wears an all-black outfit consisting of a leather jacket that flares out at the waist and is crossed with long silver zippers, tight pants and calf-high thick-heeled boots. The exterior of her packaging sees Allison grasping a pool cue and facing off against a masked Cha Cha. The interior of his packaging is a stark black covered in red and white flying bullets, knives, umbrellas and crosshairs which continues onto the protective sleeve where her figure can be seen through the large clear window at the packaging's front.

  • Height 5"
  • This collectible ships in a matte, embossed, protective outer sleeve and a custom sized plastic protector for maximum protection during shipping.

featured_image.alt: Umbrella Academy Allison YouTooz Vinyl Figure
